## 



```{r load_data}
sero_outcomes = read_csv('Outputs/serology_outcomes.csv')
inclusion_data = readxl::read_excel(path = 'Data/Time_events.xlsx')
sero_outcomes = merge(inclusion_data, sero_outcomes[,c('subjectno','outcome','type_data')],
      by = 'subjectno', all.x=T)

table(sero_outcomes$pcr_event==1 | !is.na(sero_outcomes$outcome),
      sero_outcomes$treatment)

```
